attributes.action: To ban the sale and use of prong/pinch collars on dogs.
attributes.additional_details:
Please read the RSPCA blog for more information...thanks for signing.
http://blogs.rspca.org.uk/insights/2014/04/01/pinch-collars-and-why-they-can-compromise-dog-welfare/#.VxM328h4XCQ
attributes.background: Prong (sometimes known as pinch) collars are used to 'train' a dog to behave in the way the owner wishes. Metal barbs on the inside of the collar dig into the dogs skin around its neck, causing pain and injury. This practice is torturous for the dog and completely unnecessary.
